text: Mohammad Bhar (; 24 June 2000 – July 2024) was a 24-year-old Palestinian man with Down syndrome and autism who died after being attacked by an Israeli military dog. The attack happened in a house in the Gaza Strip during the Second Battle of Shuja'iyya in the Israel–Hamas war. == See also == * * Hind Rajab * 2002 Jenin massacre == Footnotes == Category:2024 deaths Category:People with disabilities Category:People on the autism spectrum Category:People with Down syndrome Category:Civilians killed in the Israel–Hamas war Category:Death in the Gaza Strip Category:Gaza City Category:Israeli war crimes Category:Disabled people killed by the IDF Category:Pages using gadget WikiMiniAtlas Category:2000 births
title: Killing of Mohammad Bhar
